Connect. Business. Grow.


We aim to connect, digitize and grow people with innovative and efficient automating solutions

Get Started

About Us

What we aim?

Our aim is to connect and digitize small places in India and make their lives easy.

Real India is always about villages and small towns, but unfortunately people there haven't got chance to develop / learn / adapt the new tech world, and that's why we decided to do a bit from our side. We aim at:

  • Promoting local businesses and providing digital marketing to their products, helping out a bit in Vocal for Local Campaign.
  • Creating IT based solutions at minimal cost for small vendors OR businessmen.
  • Connecting everyone and easing their lives by our own SAAS solutions.
  • Developing Enterprise level solutions even for smallest business units.
  • Helping out locals to grow thier business in digital way to reach their customers at rapid pace.
Our Mission

We want to connect and digitize small scale industries in India to promote local goods and services by enterprise level IT solutions and make local vendors market better by allowing them to reach their customers and grow collectively.

Our Plan

We are developing innovative solutions which enables local business units to connect to their market digitally. We plan to connect local businesses to local customers at competitive prices, making it a win-win collaboration.

Our Vision

Businesses needs to grow digitally to grow and compete, and we provide IT solutions which are developed using cutting edge technologies and supports cross platform.

Products

Our Products

  •    

    Connect Bazar
  •    

    Treggo

Connect Bazar is a local e-commerce platform which targets customers within city / town.

  • The main target of this platform is to provide facilities for local vendors to reach local customers online.
  • Competitive pricing among vendors to provide local goods, which couldn't be found on other e-commerce platform at cheap rates.
  • Provides an admin area for vendor, where vendor can manage their orders, get sales report, product management, coupons, print bill etc.
  • Connect to your local or global customers digitally through our mobile based solutions.
  • Manage your products availability at realtime with 0 downtime.
  • We are providing this product for FREE or very minimal cost for now, so avail the benefits and create your customer base.
Let's Connect

Treggo is restaurant management system which manages your hotel / restaurant on the go.

  • Take a headstart for your hotel / restaurant from others by automating it with TREGGO.
  • Treggo creates a digital menu card for your customers, from which your customers can order their favourite food on the device attached to your table directly to your kitchen!.
  • Customers can track live status of the order right from their table.
  • Managers and kitchen users can recieve orders automatically as soon as your customer decides, what they want to have.
  • Manage previous orders, sales report, print bills, provide discount coupons and manage your products at realtime.
Let's Connect

Services

Check our Services

Website Development

We design and develop premium responsive websites which can adapt to any screen resolution.

Software Development

We develop web, mobile and desktop based software solutions to automate your business tasks

Enterprise Systems Development

We develop multi-tier based solutions which could automate your manual or repititive tasks, using cutting edge technologies.

Mobile Apps development

Since 2/3rd of internet users uses mobile devices, hence we provide native and hybrid mobile apps which works on both Android and iOS devices.

E-commerce application

We customizes e-commerce based applications specific to the business and also provides our e-commerce platform to sell your products.

Graphic Designing

We can design innovative and beautiful icons, logos, walkthrough, advertisements to boost your business.
